description: Number of 4-element intersecting families (of distinct sets) whose union is an n-element set.
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6).
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (71, -2205, 39495, -452523, 3473673, -18166175, 64427005, -150923976, 220549356, -178819920, 59875200).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Mar 11 2000
